text: Usale timi sabaila'i eka jyanabata srsti garyo, ani usaibata jodi banayo ra usaile timro nimti caupayamadhye atha jod'iharu (bhale–pothi) banayo. Usaile timra amaharuko petama e'uta akarapachi arko akarama srjana gardacha tina–tina amdhyaraharuma. Uhi allaha timro palanakarta ho. Satta usaiko ho, usabaheka kohi satya pujya chaina.
